thread.section_title: Chewy.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Chewy.com | chewy.com | 2 of 320
thread.title: Mylipke62

author: Mylipke62
title: Mylipke62
text: I'm in retail and my company goes above and beyond so I have grown to expect that when I shop. Especially online because they only have once chance to prove it to me. Chewy has gone above even my standards! I ordered a framed pet bed and it was missing an essential part. I called them, and actually talked to a person not a customer service prompt. They sent me a new one, 2nd day and told me to keep that one for spare parts. I've ordered from them three more times since and not one issue and early delivery!
